alert.note: Alert for Eastern Glacier; Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 26 at 1:22PM MST until February 28 at 6:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON SUNDAY TO 6 AM MST MONDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, west winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts of 60 to 80 mph expected. For the High Wind Watch, west winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts of 60 to 80 mph possible. * WHERE...The Rocky Mountain Front, including all of Glacier County. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from Noon Sunday to 6 AM MST Monday. For the High Wind Watch, from Monday afternoon through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris. Areas of blowing snow are expected. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Peak wind speeds will decrease Monday morning, then increase again Monday afternoon and overnight.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Glacier; Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Southern Rocky Mountain Front
